title: Matt Mixon, filmmaker/7 Angels & 7 Plagues
itunes:title: Matt Mixon, filmmaker/7 Angels & 7 Plagues
description:
Episode 230 - Every week I feel so lucky to speak to creative and inspiring individuals, and today is no different. Matt Mixon is a filmmaker and the vocalist from 7 Angels 7 Plagues who also put together an incredible documentary about his close friends in Misery Signals entitled, “Yesterday Was Everything”. It’s truly a special look at not only that band but how people’s lives are profoundly impacted by music. We also discuss early tour life and the importance of nostalgia. Dive in and enjoy! Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
